query.name: getEmployeeById
query.sql: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE employeeid = :employeeid

query.name: deleteEmployeeById
query.sql: DELETE FROM Employee e WHERE employeeid = :employeeid

query.name: updateEmployee
query.sql: UPDATE Employee e set firstName=:firstName,lastName=:lastName,userName=:userName,password=:password,street=:street,city=:city,state=:state,pinCode=:pinCode,country=:country,emailId=:emailId,contactNo=:contactNo,dateOfBirth=:dateOfBirth,designation=:designation,dateOfJoining=:dateOfJoining,yearsOfExperience=:yearsOfExperience, reportingManager_Id=:reportingManager_Id WHERE employeeid = :employeeid
